item.description:
The Kill Switch





Should the Internet have a giant kill switch?    What sort of emergency would require the U.S. President to press the button?   What if an ISP refuses to obey a disconnect order?

What would constitute a "national cyber emergency"?  

What is the proper role  for the FCC regarding bandwidth, net neutrality?  Should an ISP be able to provide faster service for some types of traffic?

Should web sites be rated?  Should adult sites be restricted to a .xxx domain?  

Join us for a discussion of the Internet, regulation and the kill switch.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for us at the large table in back.
item.name: The Kill Switch
